entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
